title: Can We get an illaoi Rework/Adjustment
body:
I for one really love playing {{champion:420}}  Illaoi, find her my personal favorite when it comes to learning new mechanics and gameplay, not to mention how to play around high mobility champs, and thats what i would like to adress..
Playing illaoi feels really hard when people know how to counter her, eg; killing her tentacles before diving in. There has been numerous times where ive chased down soo many champs to only have them escape me because of her really bad base movement speed.
Now im not saying completely rework her, but maybe a few adjustments like her W (Harsh Lesson) RANGE could be adjusted, im only saying this because once the whole enemy team all ins her, she has no real escape other than flsh, and thats a hella long cool down guys...
Perhaps even if tentacles hit provide a 1/2/3/4/5% movement speed bonus when skills put into W or Q maybe even e if you want us to use it more..

Another thing, the animations for a lot of these abilities are really slow, could you make them either a little faster or even provide her with a little more lifesteal as early game you get poked and pushed out by champs like {{champion:80}} Pantheon and {{champion:23}} Tryndamere

replies.body:
did you just complain about people playing well against you, countering is a part of the game you should learn to adjust in that situation 

also if you want more move speed 
a phage move speed quints, and/or storm raiders
He should be running storm raiders if he plays Illaoi, if he isn't then their is one of his problems

>
>  im only saying this because once the whole enemy team all ins her, she has no real escape other than flsh, and thats a hella long cool down guys...

There's not too many champs that can survive when the entire enemy team all ins them. Just ult and tentacle smash and take a few with you.

Illaoi can kill a lot of champions, and if she gained movement speed she would be even more cancerous.
In a 1v1 fight, Illaoi would 1v1 and win against a lot of champions, unless if her opponent takes extreme caution, she may even be able to 1v3 if she had her ult.
She's already strong enough, why buff her?
All champions have weakness anyway, for example, Garen seems to be able to counter a lot of champions, but he have trouble 1v1 champions like Jayce and Urgot, and maybe even Yorick.
